long_description: With light weight and a women-specific fit for enhanced comfort, the Osprey Tempest 40 Pack excels for your done-in-a-day pursuits. It's designed to accommodate a multitude of outdoor activities. Lightweight Osprey AirScape(TM) back panel features molded foam ridges with air channels and a vertical "air chimney" covered in airy mesh for ventilation. Mesh-covered, die-cut slotted foam BioStretch(TM) shoulder straps and hipbelt feature a women-specific fit; hipbelt tightens with easy ErgoPull(TM) closure. Peripheral aluminum frame adds structural support and effectively shifts load weight to your hips. Top-loading main compartment holds lunch, an extra layer of clothes and tools; lower sleeping bag compartment features separate zippered access. Removable top lid contains a zippered top pocket and mesh under-lid pocket. The Osprey Tempest 40 Pack accommodates a variety of back lengths with an adjustable torso: just rip it, adjust it and stick it. Front stretch pocket is ideal for stashing a jacket, helmet, book or other often-used gear. Zippered stretch mesh pockets on hipbelt are large enough for your compact digital camera in one and snacks in the other. Twin stretch pockets on shoulder straps are sized to fit a cell phone, GPS or to just stash the end of your hydration tube. Hydration compartment on the Tempest 40 Pack is accessible from the exterior between the torso adjustment and pack compartment (reservoir sold separately).
short_description: With light weight and a women-specific fit for enhanced comfort, the Osprey Tempest 40 Pack excels for your done-in-a-day pursuits. It's designed to accommodate a multitude of outdoor activities.
